content: Phase 4: Backend - GET /api/library/images (user-scoped, admin all) + PUT /api/images/{id}/tags
Phase 4: Frontend - ImageLibrary page (/biblioteka) with grid, search, filters, tags
Phase 4: Frontend - Lightbox modal with full preview + prev/next navigation
Phase 4: Sidebar - Add 'Biblioteka' link for all users
Phase 5: Backend - Multi-variant generation (4 at once)
Phase 5: Backend - AI edit endpoint (inpaint/background/style transfer)
Phase 5: Frontend - Multi-variant UI (2x2 grid) in generator
Phase 5: Frontend - Image editing panel (crop, filters, AI edits)
